Package assegnamento3.src

Class LoggableUser

java.lang.Object
assegnamento3.src.Person
assegnamento3.src.LoggableUser
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class LoggableUser
extends Person
implements java.io.Serializable
The LoggableUser class defines a generic person with log-in functionality.

This class will be extended by the Seller Class and Client Class to implement log-in to the store

It defines getters and setters for email, password and Id.

It extends Person to add name and surname.

See Also:
